about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a first-year student in Multiplatform App Development (DAM), specializing in digital entertainment and video games. I'm passionate about programming, especially in the context of game development and creative technology.
about.paragraph2: Right now, I'm focused on learning Unity and game development while building small projects to strengthen my skills. I enjoy working with game engines like Unity.
about.paragraph3: I love solving problems, learning how systems work under the hood, and bringing ideas to life through code. I'm currently looking for opportunities to collaborate on projects, learn from real-world challenges, and grow as a developer.
